title: Yam Yarn Recipes
description: The app makes cooking easier by giving users access to a wide range of recipes. The recipes data are from the Spoonacular Food API.

title: Georgy Portfolio
description: Worked closely with George to help him build a portfolio website to showcase his projects and learning journey in data science and AI.

title: Live flight Tracker
description: Collaborative project to track flights within the Austrian airspace in real-time. Flight data provided by OpenSky Network.

title: UATE SDI
description: The dashboard provides an overview of trends of Ukrainian asylum seekers in Europe over the past decade. The data is derived from UNHCR Refugee API.

title: Kibet Portfolio
description: Built a portfolio website to showcase my projects and learning journey in web development and geoinformatics.

title: Penton Energy
description: Built Penton Energy consulting services website to help the client audition their services and completed/ongoing projects.

title: Pyraus
description: Collaborative effort to build the Pyraus Group website. Pyraus is Kenyan based a tech start-up that offers software solutions to its clients.
